mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.parameter_id AS "parameterId", a.product_id AS "productId", a.parameter_value AS "parameterValue"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_parameter_ref( id, parameter_id, product_id, parameter_value ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{parameterId}, #{productId}, #{parameterValue} )
mapper.select: SELECT a.parameter_id FROM product_parameter_ref a WHERE a.product_id=#{productId};
